Epic 7 is a work of art. Yuna engine is a work of art. FGO has clunky garbo animations, and most other gachas do to. Epic 7 has managed to make a beautiful game while keeping loading times and lag.

Btw everything can be obtained without money and that includes the battle pass for 1800 skystones. Ofc you can buy the first half for 900 and pay 900 sky stones later and remember to join channel 2(chill) because channel 1 salty.

just because the game isn't popular (though im pretty sure it is pretty popular),u can't use it to prove your point of the game is bad because  E7 come from a studio that never have any fame in making gacha (or have any fame at all before) or have a super strong publisher like yostar (their publisher is mediocre if you ask me) so it is admirable that E7 make it big on their own .and to the guy who said that there's no getting gud at the game ,there are still plenty of things to get gud at the game because u have to know each heroes abilities ,plan your team formation and ability usage ,gearing the heroes ,ect... so there is still plenty of space to "git gud scub" ,there are meta and its very hard to deal with it but that doesn't mean u can't defeat them and form a team  that can defeat them ,RNG is a bitch but planning is still everything . though the dev should really start focusing and polish some part of the game but it is still a good game imho
good doujin btw ,nice art ,i like it
I never thought I'd see the day with epic seven on the trending tab of nhentai

i'd say E7 is a good game ,take that from a person who've played over 10 gacha and is still grinding 4 gacha (E7 is one of them) .E7 is a F2P and not P2W ,it is possible to play the entire game and raise in rank in pvp without paying ,it is just the difference between a F2P and P2W is clear enough so smilegate can make money .And u can't bring pvp up and use it as an excuse to say the game is P2W because pvp is an endgame content ,it is there for you after u complete almost every pve ,build up lots of strong heroes . there are a lot of P2W in high rank pvp but there are also F2P and F2P BTW up there ,people who've grind day and night to get materials because they like the game .As for the RNG shitfest ,yes ,i can't defend that because it is a shitfest but that is still no reason to call it a P2W because in the end ,nothing is lock away from you and it is still there for you to grind later ,if you want to blame something then either blame your bad luck or blame their good luck in RNG .

Why I play FPS and fighting games? The comment section. I seriously cannot find a good game with grind other than KOF AS, which is still crappy if you play in IB mode because everyone has damn awakened fighters. Not only that, most bronze and silver fighters are useless. I must try this game then.

Ofc aim for meta units too. If u can't beat the meta, then join it bc rng cucks everyone p2w or f2p it doesn't matter.

"Popular now" works quite weird who would've thought e7 got up here again. Btw e7 F2P as hell, but what people don't understand and mistaken for p2w is the rng and power creep. Btw lots of 3 star units can make more progress for u in the game than most 5 stars, so invest in wyvern 13 units(alexa 3*, taranor guard(uses a spear) 3*, some 4* like karin) so you can farm speed gear. After that epic 7 is FP2 as hella given that you auto for a few weeks or months, but with that you can easily out class players that have play for 2 years. You should also try to get Angelic Montmorancy(Specialty change) as she'll help you get through the last parts of chapter 2 and basically almost ALL of chapter 3 so far.
Why nobody talks about the God-tier art?  It was a great read. And ya all complaining about gatcha. Pathetic.

the guy who said that e7 is a p2w rng fest lol what a joke e7 is one of the most f2p friendly gacha ever sure you can whale to get gud characters but the gear is the deciding factor if your gear is shit that ml5 of your is also shit hell put a good gear on a 3 star unit and they'll wreck chars that has a shit gear and about being rng i mean every gacha games is rng base Right? the best way to describe e7 is grind if you want to get gud

Y'all hating on epic 7 because of RNG shitfest on PvP need to grow up. Epic 7 needs PvP content (PvP oriented heroes, RNG, Gear, etc) to provide end-game content to their players. Unlike other gachas, epic seven started off without any franchise to back them up and statted off from scratches hence why the small popularity. Besides, think about it. What can you ACTUALLY do in OTHERS GACHA such as FGO, Azur Lane, etc besides farming mats and grinding which is doing the same shit over and over again. When tou reach the end game Epic seven is much better than those shitty ass game that you'l leave after 1 month of grinding because they lack content other than story.

The guy complaining about the rng fest clearly has never played MMOs or diablo-likes and is a clown. Epic 7 is literally the most f2p gacha there is since your grind dictates how far you get into the game vs just throwing money to progress, there's fucking nothing P2W about it.
Game is heavily RNG based but it's fun. If you have the patience play it but you will be shafted a lot
Its bait, that guy is tryhard f2p legend rank.

It is, in fact, an rng shit fest. But you can't really whale to get good gear, only good units. And even then, you can get by using free units to get god gear, then slapping them on units. The major deciding factor is how much effort you put into your team, because even a newish whale would lose to an experienced F2P player.
